ï»¿He's the choice of a country desperate for change.
A politician who's neither left nor right.
Part of the French establishment, yet never before elected.
A fresh face who served in the outgoing government.
To his supporters, he's their Emmanuel, their political messiah,...
...a provincial boy from outside the establishment who worked his way to power.
Emmanuel Macron has vowed to unite the divided and disillusioned France,...
...but his critics say he's just the old wine in a shiny new bottle,...
...and the price of failure could be high.
